title: How many times can I give a backlog? How many attempts total?

comments.body: You have unlimited attempts. Although you should know that each attempt is not free.
I heard that if you fail a backlog paper 3 times they will rusticate you(please take it with a fistful of salt)
There is no such rule. Best to not spread misinformation.
Which is why I added the last part. Thanks for clarifying üôè
I _think_ u can do it only up to 4 times, more than that means ur degree will be nullified

No, you can write any number of times.

But a fact that many students miss is that your internals are not counted, so you have to pass in the esa itself, ie esa is given 100% weightage
in january they will conduct backlog or not?
No it's going on right now. Next one will be in may
Who told u as many times u can write ?
Unlimited. But try and complete before you graduate. You can take them in summer too. Its 250 per credit, with the max number of credits taken each sem to be 24.

No the backlogs is during the semester exams (December or May)

Summer term is in July.
